    Vincent Herrmann

    PhD in machine learning at IDSIA. Classical pianist. Interested in artificial and human creativity.

    About

    I am a PhD candidate at the Swiss AI Lab IDSIA, University of Lugano, working under the supervision of Prof. Jürgen Schmidhuber. My research focuses on artificial curiosity, representation learning, reinforcement learning, and information theory. My goal is to discover criteria for identifying the interestingness of objects and to develop effective representations for them. I am also a classical pianist and composer.
